trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc
 *  Allows for the serenity-bdd command line interface output to be intercepted for testing purposes.
 *
 * @typedef {function(error: Error, parsed: object, output: string): void} Interceptor
 *
 * @package

trailingComments.value:
*
 * @desc
 *  Invokes the serenity-bdd command line interface, responsible for downloading and running
 *  the [Serenity BDD CLI](https://github.com/serenity-bdd/serenity-cli)
 *
 * @param {string[]} argv
 * @param {Interceptor} interceptor
 *
 * @package

*
 * @desc
 *  Invokes the serenity-bdd command line interface, responsible for downloading and running
 *  the [Serenity BDD CLI](https://github.com/serenity-bdd/serenity-cli)
 *
 * @param {string[]} argv
 * @param {Interceptor} interceptor
 *
 * @package

extra.rawValue: updates the Serenity jar to the latest version
extra.raw: 'updates the Serenity jar to the latest version'

arguments.value: updates the Serenity jar to the latest version

extra.rawValue: generates the HTML report from JSON reports produced by Serenity/JS
extra.raw: 'generates the HTML report from JSON reports produced by Serenity/JS'

arguments.value: generates the HTML report from JSON reports produced by Serenity/JS
